title: Village Street, 2, Dzukija, Lithuania
marks: Signature, Title, Date and Sticker on back, in pencil: [A. Sutkus, 1969] and ANTANAS
description: man standing on a deserted village street scattered with leaves; man wears beret, corduroy jacket and boots; little boy stands behind man, looking up at him
creditline: Gift of funds from David and Mary M.D. Parker
